sentence: Hi, I am Anna. How are you?
I am good, thanks. How are you?
Good! Where are you from, Alexis?
Oh, this is nice. Are you French then?
Yes, I am French. I am born in Paris. Where are you from Anna?
I am from Lisbon. I born in Setubal.
It is close to Lisbon. One hour by train
Sounds nice. hope to get there some day!
